definition[0]: when other people do not know who you are or what your name is
example[0]: Every step will be taken to preserve your anonymity.
example[1]: One official, who spoke on condition of anonymity  (=he would only speak if his name was not told), said the White House took the threat very seriously.
example[2]: the anonymity of city streets  (=you do not know anyone, and no one knows you)
